Magister Page:
Welcome. Open you book and let's see how far you have progressed....
Why are you looking at me like that? Aren't you here to learn magic? Ah, don't believe that fool over there -- he sees conspiracies around every corner and behind every shuttered window...
Moses , you fool, stop scaring travelers with your babbling!
Well, let's get down to business. What exactly are you here to learn?
